channel.title: OpenHW TV on
channel.description: Recent content in OpenHW TV on

item.title: OpenHW TV S01E01
item.author: info@openhwgroup.org (OpenHW Group)
item.description: We live-streamed a world class first episode of OpenHW TV on 18th June and even exceeded our registration numbers, as guest presenters from Metrics and Imperas highlighted the open source CORE-V processor IP design verification plan. Our live Q&A session at the end with panellists from OpenHW Group including the Co-Chairs of our Verification Task Group was extremely popular and provoked some great discussion.
